markdownRemark.excerpt:
TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that extends JavaScript by adding types.
It saves you time by catching the errors before you run the code.
markdownRemark.html: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that extends JavaScript by adding types. It saves you time by catching the errors before you run the code.

frontmatter.title: Learn TypeScript
frontmatter.description: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that extends JavaScript by adding types. It saves you time by catching the errors before you run the code.It compiles down to JavaScript. Let's dive in and see how this JavaScript with types look like.

frontmatter.title: Data Structures and Algorithms in JavaScript
